item.title: 快速充电电池公司 Nyobolt 为扩张融资 3000 万美元
item.description: 英国快速充电电池技术公司 Nyobolt 周三表示，该公司已融资 3000 万美元，用于扩大其在自主仓储机器人和重型车辆领域的业务，并进军包括主流电动汽车在内的新市场。【原文：UK fast-charging battery technology company Nyobolt has raised $30 million to expand its business in autonomous warehouse robots and heavy duty vehicles and move into new markets including mainstream electric vehicles, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：市场因中美争论而摇摆不定
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.title: 神户的关税转型在中国工厂中心落地生根
item.description: 超快时尚零售商 Shein 的迅速崛起对中国南方大都市广州郊区的一群城中村的命运至关重要，因此这些城中村被俗称为 "Shein 村"。【原文：The rapid rise of ultra-fast fashion retailer Shein has been so key to the fortunes of a group of urban villages on the outskirts of China's southern metropolis of Guangzhou that they have been colloquially dubbed "Shein villages".】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：普华永道退出十多个国家的业务
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，普华永道已关闭了在十几个国家的业务，这些业务被认为规模太小、风险太大或无利可图，因为这家四大会计师事务所的目标是防止曾影响过它的丑闻重演。【原文：PwC has shut down operations in more than a dozen countries that are deemed too small, risky or unprofitable, as the Big Four accounting firm aims to prevent repeats of scandals that have affected it, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍德赛德公司聘请墨西哥太平洋公司首席执行官 Bairstow 负责路易斯安那液化天然气项目
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的天然气生产商伍德赛德能源公司（Woodside Energy）周三表示，该公司已聘请墨西哥太平洋公司（Mexico Pacific）首席执行官莎拉-巴斯托（Sarah Bairstow）负责其在美国路易斯安那州的液化天然气工厂。【原文：Australia's top gas producer Woodside Energy said on Wednesday it had hired Sarah Bairstow, the chief executive of Mexico Pacific, for its Louisiana liquefied natural gas plant in the United States.】

item.title: 本田公司将把运往美国的五门版思域混合动力车的生产从日本转移到印第安纳州
item.description: 本田汽车公司发言人周三表示，该公司将把运往美国的五门思域混合动力车型的生产从日本转移到印第安纳州。【原文：Honda Motor will shift production of its U.S.-bound five-door Civic hybrid model from Japan to Indiana, a company spokesperson said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在与美国的关税战中，中国更换了最高贸易谈判代表
item.description: 在与美国的关税战不断升级之际，中国周三解除了商务部副部长王受文的贸易谈判代表职务，并由一名前中国驻世界贸易组织代表取而代之。【原文：China on Wednesday removed Vice Commerce Minister Wang Shouwen from his role as trade negotiator and replaced him with a former Chinese representative to the World Trade Organization, amid an escalating tariff war with the United States.】

item.title: 澳大利亚赌场运营商星际（Star）业绩疲软，复牌后大幅波动
item.description: 周三，澳大利亚陷入困境的赌场运营商星际娱乐公司（Star Entertainment）在宣布半年亏损超过预期后恢复交易，股价大幅波动。【原文：Shares of Australia's embattled casino operator Star Entertainment fluctuated sharply on Wednesday as trading resumed after the firm announced a larger-than-expected half-year loss.】

item.title: 专家对中国第一季度 GDP 增长的看法
item.description: 周三的数据显示，中国第一季度经济同比增长5.4%，超过预期，但与美国的贸易战给中国经济前景蒙上了阴影，并增加了中国政府进一步推出刺激政策的压力。【原文：China's economy grew 5.4% year-on-year in the first quarter, data showed on Wednesday, surpassing estimates, but a trade war with the United States has cast a shadow over the outlook and raised pressure on Beijing to roll out further stimulus.】

item.title: 英伟达抑制粉丝忧虑，黄金创纪录，亚洲股市下跌
item.description: 周三亚洲股市下跌，原因是人工智能宠儿英伟达（Nvidia）因美国限制对华芯片销售而受到冲击，这凸显了针锋相对的全球贸易战所带来的损害，同时黄金创下历史新高，美元继续承压。【原文：Shares fell in Asia on Wednesday as AI darling Nvidia took a hit from U.S. curbs on chip sales to China, highlighting the damage to come in a tit-for-tat global trade war, while gold hit a record and the dollar stayed under pressure.】

item.title: 中国Xpeng公司称已重新审视供应链，使其免受关税动荡的影响
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商新鹏汽车周三表示，该公司已对其供应链进行了 "彻底分析"，以确保不会受到当前美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税和中美紧张关系引发的动荡的影响。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker Xpeng said on Wednesday that it had done a "thorough analysis" of its supply chain to ensure it would not be impacted by the current turmoil caused by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs and tensions with China.】

item.title: 美国发布 Nvidia 和 AMD 芯片对华出口许可要求
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，它将对 Nvidia 的 H20、AMD 的 MI308 人工智能芯片以及它们的同类产品向中国发布新的出口许可要求。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Tuesday it was issuing new export licensing requirements for Nvidia's H20, AMD's MI308 artificial intelligence chips, as well as their equivalents, to China.】

item.title: 中国出口商在 Rednote 上要求当地消费者购买销往美国的商品
item.description: 从饭盒到电器等商品的中国卖家纷纷在社交媒体平台 "红笔记"（Rednote）上引发同情性购买，他们告诉国内消费者，在美国加征关税之际，他们正在以低廉的价格出售库存。【原文：Chinese sellers of items from lunch boxes to appliances have taken to social media platform Rednote to generate sympathy purchases, telling domestic consumers they are offloading stock at bargain prices amid U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 中国第一季度 GDP 同比增长 5.4% 超预期
item.description: 周三的数据显示，中国第一季度经济同比增长5.4%，好于预期，但与美国贸易战的升级使前景暗淡，并增加了中国政府推出更多刺激措施的压力。【原文：China's economy grew 5.4% year-on-year in the first quarter, data showed on Wednesday, beating expectations, but an escalating trade war with the United States has darkened the outlook and raised pressure on Beijing to roll out more stimulus.】

item.title: 澳大利亚拉链公司季度现金收益创历史新高，2025 财年业绩预期上调，业绩飙升
item.description: 澳大利亚 "先买后付 "公司 Zip Co 周三公布了创纪录的季度现金收益，这得益于其美国业务的强劲表现，该公司还上调了 2025 财年的盈利预期，股价上涨超过 18%。【原文：Australian buy-now, pay-later firm Zip Co posted record quarterly cash earnings on Wednesday, helped by strong performance from its U.S. operations and raised its fiscal 2025 earnings forecast, sending its shares more than 18% higher.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普对 Cybercab 和 Semi 的中国零部件征收关税扰乱了特斯拉在美国的生产计划
item.description: 一位直接知情人士说，唐纳德-特朗普总统在贸易战中对中国商品加征关税后，特斯拉从中国向美国运输 Cybercab 和 Semi 电动卡车部件的计划被暂停。【原文：Tesla 's plans to ship components from China for Cybercab and Semi electric trucks in the United States were suspended after President Donald Trump raised tariffs on Chinese goods amid a trade war, said a person with direct knowledge.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，投资公司 H Partners 准备与哈雷戴维森一决高下
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，面对哈雷戴维森不断恶化的销售业绩，美国投资公司 H Partners 正准备发起一场撼动哈雷戴维森董事会和更换首席执行官的斗争。【原文：U.S. investment firm H Partners is preparing to launch a fight to shake up Harley-Davidson's board and replace its CEO in the face of deteriorating sales, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元卖家喘口气，英镑屹立不倒
item.description: 周三，美元小幅反弹，因为投资者从几周来相当激烈的抛售中得到喘息，市场趋于稳定，等待美国贸易谈判取得进展。【原文：The dollar clung to a small bounce on Wednesday, as investors took a breather from weeks of fairly fierce selling and markets stabilised to wait for progress on U.S. trade talks.】

item.title: 市场评估贸易战影响，石油价格低迷
item.description: 油价周三早盘持平，原因是美国贸易政策的变化加剧了不确定性，同时市场评估了中美贸易战对经济增长和能源需求的潜在影响。【原文：Oil prices were flat early on Wednesday, as shifting U.S. trade policies fuelled uncertainty while markets assessed the potential impact of the U.S.-China trade war on economic growth and energy demand.】

item.title: 巴哈马暂停 SpaceX 火箭着陆，等待发射后调查
item.description: 巴哈马政府周二表示，在进行全面的发射后调查之前，将暂停所有 SpaceX 猎鹰 9 号火箭在该国的着陆。【原文：The Bahamas' government said on Tuesday it is suspending all SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket landings in the country, pending a full post-launch investigation.】

item.title: 香港邮政暂停美国邮政服务
item.description: 香港邮政周三表示，将从 4 月 27 日起暂停对寄往美国的空邮物品提供邮政服务，并称香港居民应做好支付 "高昂和不合理费用 "的准备。【原文：Hong Kong Post said on Wednesday that it would suspend its postal service for items containing goods to the United States, for air mail from April 27, and said that Hong Kong residents should be prepared to pay "exorbitant and unreasonable fees".】

item.title: 全球经济下滑，燃料零售商安波尔第一季度炼油利润减半
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的燃料零售商安波尔公司（Ampol）周三报告称，其位于昆士兰州的莱顿炼油厂第一季度炼油利润率下降了 49%，原因是亚洲的风向标--新加坡的炼油利润疲软。【原文：Australia's top fuel retailer Ampol reported a 49% drop in first-quarter refining margins for its Lytton refinery in Queensland on Wednesday, citing weakness in refining profits in Singapore — a bellwether for Asia.】

item.title: 日本 2 月机械订单月率增长 4.3
item.description: 日本政府周三公布的数据显示，日本 2 月份核心机械订单环比增长 4.3%。【原文：Japan's core machinery orders rose 4.3% in February from the previous month, government data showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 加州总检察长拒绝加入马斯克对 OpenAI 的诉讼
item.description: 加利福尼亚州总检察长办公室在周二公开的一封信中拒绝加入埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对 OpenAI 提起的诉讼，称总检察长办公室认为马斯克的行为不符合该州的公共利益。【原文：The California attorney general's office declined to join a lawsuit by Elon Musk against OpenAI, the agency wrote in a letter made public on Tuesday, saying that the office did not see how Musk's action serves the public interest of the state.】

item.title: 中国第一季度经济增长可能放缓，关税令前景黯淡
item.description: 在房地产长期低迷的情况下，中国第一季度的经济增速预计将有所放缓，决策者们正在为美国巨额关税的影响做准备，分析人士称，美国关税对这个亚洲强国构成了数十年来最大的风险。【原文：China's economy is expected to have slowed in the first quarter in the face of a prolonged property downturn, as policymakers brace for the impact of hefty U.S. tariffs that analysts say pose the biggest risk to the Asian powerhouse in decades.】

item.title: 中国就如何处理加密货币犯罪缓存展开辩论
item.description: 中国从非法交易中查获的加密货币越来越多，这促使地方政府想方设法处理这些囤积的加密货币，也刺激了法院和金融业要求加强监管的呼声。【原文：China's growing pile of cryptocurrencies seized from illegal transactions is prompting local governments to find ways to dispose of the hoard and spurring calls from courts and the financial industry for better regulation.】

item.title: 受特朗普关税影响，日本制造商对商业前景转为谨慎：路透社民调
item.description: 路透社 Tankan 民意调查显示，日本制造商 4 月份的商业景气较 3 月份有所改善，但由于要应对美国全面进口关税的影响，他们对未来三个月的前景持悲观态度。【原文：Japanese manufacturers expressed improved business sentiment in April versus March though are bearish about their outlook over the next three months as they brace for the impact of sweeping U.S. import tariffs, a Reuters Tankan poll found.】

item.title: 管理者称，美国对关键网络漏洞数据库的资助即将耗尽
item.description: 以国防和研究为重点的非营利性机构 MITRE 公司称，美国政府对该公司维护全球安全研究人员和数字防御人员使用的重要网络漏洞数据库的资助将于周三用完。【原文：The defense and research-focused nonprofit MITRE Corporation says funding from the U.S. government runs out on Wednesday for it to maintain a critical database of cyber vulnerabilities used by security researchers and digital defenders the world over.】

item.title: OpenAI 任命其非营利委员会成员
item.description: 聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 周二任命了新成立的非营利委员会成员，该委员会将指导公司的慈善工作。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI named members to its newly formed nonprofit commission on Tuesday, which will guide the company's philanthropic efforts.】

item.title: 美国财政部长：尽管债券市场动荡不安，但中国不存在将国债武器化的风险
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二在接受雅虎财经（Yahoo Finance）采访时驳斥了有关中国不顾债券市场波动而将其国债武器化的担忧，并补充说中国不存在利用其雄厚的国债储备给美国经济造成痛苦的潜在风险。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent in an interview with Yahoo Finance on Tuesday dismissed concerns over China weaponizing its Treasuries despite bond market volatility and added there was no risk of China potentially using its robust Treasury pile to inflict economic pain on the United States.】
